Scroll to top with just a single click. 

Daily scrolling through long pages can be an exhausting experience, especially on sites that offer infinite scrolling (like Facebook, Twitter, etc).
You'll keep scrolling with your mouse to see more and more updates, and then when you want to go to the top of the page, you might move your hand from your mouse to the keyboard to search for the Home key or you might drag the scroll bar to the top.
Scroll To The Top tries to minimize this effort by providing an intuitive icon in the bottom-right corner of every page, so that with just one click, youâ€™ll be at the top of the page with beautiful animation. No more searching for the Home key on your keyboard, and no more dragging the scroll bar.
It's just going to be fun and ergonomic to use.
Please note that this extension doesn't work on every page. It works on most sites but it won't scroll down the browser's internal pages (settings, history, etc.) and some complex web pages (like the Add-ons store itself, for example).
